Test Name: T-Cell Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia/Lymphoma (ALL) FISH, Pediatric
Specimen Type: Bone marrow aspirate, peripheral blood, or tissue biopsy
Purpose: Detection of T-Cell Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia/Lymphoma (ALL) in pediatric patients using Fluorescence In Situ Hybridization (FISH).
Equipment: ThermoBrite or equivalent hybridization system and fluorescence microscope with appropriate filters
